about_the_game:
Become a Cybermedic and save wounded cybernetic humans during space battles. Implant artificial limbs into humanoids and replace damaged organs using bionic implants. Do everything in your power to save humanoids life.



If you ever wondered how the cyberpunk technology is used by military medics during space battle, CyberMedic Simulator is the game for you!

Your responsibility is to help soldiers, who got injured on the battlefield. Use medical drone to find the wounded humanoids.
Use specialized tools to identify damaged organs and tissues. Evaluate the damage degree in order to select a proper bionic implant.

If you determine which part of the body needs replacing, then get to work! Remember that you have to act quickly, because wounded cybernetic body won’t survive long without your help!

If you ever wondered how the cyberpunk technology is used by military medics during space battle, CyberMedic Simulator is the game for you!

If you determine which part of the body needs replacing, then get to work! Remember that you have to act quickly, because wounded cybernetic body won’t survive long without your help!
legal_notice: This game is in the early stages of development. The gameplay shown in the trailer is subject to change before release.
name: CyberMedic Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 570 4GB VRAM / GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 8GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.

short_description: Become a Cybermedic. Search for the wounded cybernetic humans during space battles. Transplant artificial limbs and replace damaged organs using bionic implants. Do everything in your power to save humanoids life.
